review: Easy to plug in and get it to work.
author: Bernard Luscans

review: It is a little glitchy sometimes. In netflix, for example, it will get stuck scrolling for a while. I dont like that I cant actually turn it off, either. The biggest issue I have is that it cant be close to the router or it wont pick up, which means I cant use it in my living room, but I can use it fine in my bedroom. Overall, I am very happy with it.
author: Candie

review: Its great and easy to use.
author: Michelle

review: Love my Fire TV Stick...so much that I have 2 now!Thank you Amazon Smile for giving back by donating a portion of our purchases to charity...so proud to be a Prime Member of this organization! Way to go Amazon, you make me Smile!!
author: Amazon Faithful

review: Works as advertised, easy to set up.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love this thing!!  Now I can see all the shows I miss while watching other programs.  It was well worth the money.
author: dmsbrit

review: Bought  3 of them to place on all my tvs to watch MLB.....Waste of money......Can't watch games because of continuous buffering which makes the games unwatchable. Amazon nor MLB doing anything to correct problem....
author: JV

review: i sorry i can get the pictures of what iam watching but i caint get any sound and i tried and tried to get the sound if u can help me -please let me know

review: It does foe me what I wanted.
author: Steven Beverung

review: Love this item, haven't had any problems with it at all. It's great!
